name: 李志鴻
objective:
本課程涵蓋廣泛之工業 4.0 - 智能化生產所需相關基礎技術，包括工業革命簡史、人工智慧演算法、物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
This course covers a wide range of fundamental technologies pertinent to Industry 4.0-Intelligent production, including a brief history of the industrial revolution, artificial intelligence algorithms, technologies and application examples of the Internet of Things, cloud service systems and information security technologies, big data management, analysis, and application examples, intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robotics technology and applications, etc.
